scripts.prebuild: node -e "const fs = require('fs'); const path = require('path'); const filePath = path.resolve('public/.well-known/farcaster.json'); let config; try { config = JSON.parse(fs.readFileSync(filePath, 'utf8')); } catch (e) { console.error('Failed to read or parse farcaster.json:', e); process.exit(1); } const addresses = (process.env.VITE_ALLOWED_ADDRESSES || '').split(',').map(a => a.trim()).filter(Boolean); config.baseBuilder.allowedAddresses = addresses.length > 0 ? addresses : ['']; fs.writeFileSync(filePath, JSON.stringify(config, null, 2)); console.log('Successfully updated farcaster.json with allowed addresses.');"
scripts.print-deps: npm list chalk strip-ansi color-convert color-name is-core-module error-ex has-ansi
scripts.build: npm run print-deps && tsc && vite build
